games.name: Los Angeles Chargers at Houston Texans

headlines.description: — Derek Stingley says the Texans aim to force three turnovers a game.
headlines.shortLinkText: Texans intercept Herbert a career-high 4 times in a 32-12 win over Chargers in wild-card playoff

headlines.description: — Lamar Jackson handed off to Derrick Henry, then slid out to the left as if he still had the ball. A couple linebackers shifted into Jackson's path, leaving the middle open for Henry to run through for <a...
headlines.shortLinkText: Jackson and Henry lead the way as the Ravens run over the rival Steelers 28-14 in the AFC playoffs

headlines.description: — Josh Allen and the Buffalo Bills' spread-the-wealth approach on offense that was so productive in the regular season proved unstoppable in their...
headlines.shortLinkText: Josh Allen leads balanced offense as Bills dominate Broncos for 31-7 wild-card win

games.name: Green Bay Packers at Philadelphia Eagles

headlines.description: — Dallas Goedert fired one stiff arm to a Packers defender, smacked him again and then — in a sports city known for its Broad Street Bullies — dispatched one final shot to the face on his way to end zone.
headlines.shortLinkText: Hurts tosses 2 TD passes and Goedert throws 3 stiff-arms to lead Eagles past Packers 22-10

games.name: Washington Commanders at Tampa Bay Buccaneers

headlines.description: — New owners. New general manager. New coach. New franchise quarterback.
headlines.shortLinkText: Jayden Daniels leads Commanders to first playoff win in nearly 7,000 days, 23-20 over the Buccaneers

games.name: Minnesota Vikings at Los Angeles Rams

notes.headline: NFC Wild Card Playoffs - Moved to Arizona due to wildfires in Los Angeles

headlines.description: — Sam Darnold tried to step up in the pocket to find a receiver but there was nowhere to go. The blue and yellow wall that was the Los Angeles Rams' defense closed too fast.
headlines.shortLinkText: Rams overwhelm Vikings 27-9 in wild-card playoff game moved to Arizona because of LA wildfires
